duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate and facilitate corporate business development efforts and formulate go-to-market strategies.
Lead sales efforts and maintain client relationships, while monitoring market trends and presenting new product recommendations.
Develop strategic alliances, compose proposals, and provide direction for the attainment of long-term business objectives.
Oversee the management and implementation of business development systems, including technical project teams.
Be involved in the Electric Vehicle (EV) and Solar domains within the Utilities & Industrial sector.
Undertake travel up to 40% of the time.

education_certification.credential: Associate degree in engineering, science, or a business-related field, or equivalent professional experience (with a minimum of 8 years' pertinent experience).
